title: ECHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 13 Driver, Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The Ex-Service Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Gynecologists, Radiologists, Medical Specialists, Medical Officers, Nursing Assistants, Pharmacists, Lab Technicians, Drivers, and  Dental Technicians. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BDS, B. Pharm, MD/MS, DNB, 10th, 12th, 8th, DMLT, PGDM, GNM, B.Sc Nur...
